edu.umd.umiacs.cummings.GSBL
Class GSBLRuntimeConfiguration

java.lang.Object
  edu.umd.umiacs.cummings.GSBL.GSBLRuntimeConfiguration

public class GSBLRuntimeConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object

Class to keep track of runtime configuration for GSBL services. Each class has a static instance of one of these objects that contains the information stored in the service's runtime configuration XML file. At present, the runtime configuration file supports specification of GRAM-related parameters (the executable to run, the scheduler to submit to, and the location of the argument description XML file).

                                java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
Initialize a runtimeArguments object.

Parameters:
descriptionFileName - the name of the XML file describing the arguments.
Throws:
IOEXception - if the description file could not be opened.
JDOMException - if the description file was invalid.
java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the XML parser could not be initialized.
